title: How old were the characters during the first season of Friends?

og.title: How old were the characters during the first season of Friends?
og.description:
Answer (1 of 9): Rachel's middle name is Karen, and was 24 in the pilot and 34 in the finale (Birthday: May 5, 1970).

Monica's middle initial is E. (she buys "MEG" shares because they form her initials), and was 24 in the pilot and 34 in the finale (Birthday: March 22, 1970). However, in The One...
